DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect one week immobilization follow carpal tunnel release surgery versus immobilization .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo open carpal tunnel release include study . Patients must clinical evidence carpal tunnel syndrome . Patients must positive EMG result . English speaking patient . Patient selection factor include : Ability willingness follow instruction . Patients able willing return followup evaluation . Patients race gender . Patients able follow care instruction . Patients le 18 year old . Patients pregnant . Patients unwilling unable comply rehabilitation program carpal tunnel release indicate difficulty inability return followup visit prescribe study protocol . Patients qualify inclusion study , refuse consent participate study .
